website_summaries.verdict: An automatic fetching machine designed with smaller dogs in mind.
pros: Three levels of distance from 10 to 30 feet
Throws smaller balls, which works great for smaller breeds
Can run on batteries or AC power
cons: This mini machine does not use standard-size tennis balls
Does not come with rechargeable batteries

customer_reviews.title: FOOMP!
customer_reviews.text: Well, it seems to do exactly as advertised.. unfortunately I didn't realize that the lowest setting of 10m is still pretty forceful! It sounds exactly like this... wwwuuuuUUURRRRR-FOOMP! Not nearly as loud as I thought it'd be from another review I read. I need to figure out how to... devigorate this. No giggity.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Hwip

customer_reviews.title: Expensive piece of broken plastic. Not good.
customer_reviews.text: This was probably my dogs favorite thing in the world, unfortunately after a half hour play session once a day for two days it wont turn on anymore! I've tried every outlet in my house and tried many different battery brands thinking it was a lack of power but this thing just wont work. Most expensive piece of plastic I own that sits in my house doing nothing. Extremely disappointed!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Did not like
customer_reviews.text: This toy kept hitting my dog in the face. Thy should have a safety device that detects anything in front of the device. It throws out pretty hard so we put it away for now. I think for this product people should make safety a priority. I mean my dog is very small and she was hit pretty hard. Even if th balls are small they fly out with force. So not a good choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: Anna A

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Wiring or Power Problems
customer_reviews.text: Machine stopped working electrically after one short session of returning ball. She loved the game but was so upset when it wouldn't work anymore! I thought I filled out paperwork to return item but never received a return label like friends had told me I would get to mail my purchase back. If it were guaranteed I would buy it for my yorkie again but not interested if possibility of power button or wiring problem persists. Sorry
customer_reviews.author: Freda Thomas

customer_reviews.title: You would be better buying a monkey to throw balls.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our dog who is obsessed with playing ball. If the device threw the balls they were inconsistent in the distance they would go. Usually 5 to 10 feet. Over 50% of the time it would not throw the balls at all. I sent this back the day after purchasing. I was disappointed as soon I dropped the first ball in.
customer_reviews.author: Up 4 The Adventure

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: This did not hold up at all. After a month it barely shot out the ball a few feet even when on the 20 or 30 foot distance button.. The motor sounds like it will fail anytime soon. I sent an email to the manufacturer and have yet to receive a reply. The concept is good and I wish it performed as advertised. My dog caught on very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara614

customer_reviews.title: Our Corgi Loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: We weren't sure if we should purchase this or not, but so glad we did! It only took him 3 20 minute sessions to figure it out and keeps him entertained! My only negative review is I have to wipe the inside down after 15 minutes of play because the ball gets so wet and it's unable to push the ball through. This product has proven very entertaining during our isolation time and breaks up our day with some much needed laughs!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: I love this launcher! It's easy to use and makes playing with my dog a lot more fun. Sometimes you get tired of playing fetch the traditional way so this is a life-saver. It does take some effort to teach a dog how to use it, but it's not difficult. We got out dog using it on his own in less than a day. I'd recommend to anyone with a dog that loves fetch - which is just about all of them!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: Ball only goes a couple feet. Only the first couple throws from the highest setting go the right distance. My guess is the ball gets wet from my dog's mouth and the unit won't shoot but a few feet. I bought a different type of ball that my dog can't chew up and it won't work at all. No idea why except it is rubber like instead of fuzzy like the tennis balls. Big waste.
customer_reviews.author: Staci S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for corgis
customer_reviews.text: Love that it engages my dog til she tires, which is not to quick. She's a corgi and is learning to bring back, but doesn't give the ball back so we keep two balls going to get her to drop one
customer_reviews.author: Little Snooters

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in. Nothing happens. Seller wants me to pay to return it. That's almost as much as I paid for it. Foot note : the balls are not regular size tennis balls. Mini tennis balls.
customer_reviews.author: C.A C.

customer_reviews.title: So much fun for my frenchie
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it, he can’t wait to play with it every day. Balls are smaller than normal tennis type, but still works for small - medium breeds. Do not try this model on big breeds, they’ll choke with the small balls.
customer_reviews.author: DaniDan

customer_reviews.title: No issues yet, still teaching the dog!
customer_reviews.text: Just like picture, i have mine plugged into the wall. Dog still needs teaching to drop it into the top, but that will just take time and patience! would recommend for smart dogs and dogs who love chasing balls! or just sit at your desk and drop it in the top facing in the direction you would like the machine to throw it.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Mears

customer_reviews.title: Shiba approved!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my little shiba is in awe over this. She is in love. We keep it set up and when she chooses, she plays!
customer_reviews.author: Marietta

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The launcher works well. You drop the ball in and it spits it out. My dog just needs some training and guidance to learn to do it herself.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Fuentez

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for keeping your dog active
customer_reviews.text: It had my sons Corgi a bit distant at first but with some hands on to show her how it works she now enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: RBade

customer_reviews.title: Train your dog to put the ball inside
customer_reviews.text: Product is ok if you get your dog to put the ball inside. Otherwise, you end up getting up every time he wants to play.
customer_reviews.author: Yari

customer_reviews.title: Would not even turn on
customer_reviews.text: Did not even turn on and looked used when I unpacked it. I would not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: C. Weschler

customer_reviews.title: You will not be unhappy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, excellent price. I only wish my dog were a smart as this device
customer_reviews.author: Julie Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was automatic. The ball drops in and rolls out. Not worth $2
customer_reviews.author: vollichick

customer_reviews.title: Small balls.  Not good for medium, or large breeds.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize the balls were micro small. They're good for small breeds, but I have an Australian Cattle Dog. I'm actually concerned that it might launch a ball down his throat. Other then my personal concerns with my dog, it seems like a good product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Not for large breed dogs. motion sensor doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: Balls are too small for a golden retriever. This is not meant for large breed dogs like it claims. The motion sensor doesn't work a lot of times.
customer_reviews.author: jodilee coy

customer_reviews.title: Need to train your dog how to use
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea but my dog is scared of this. He thinks someone is throwing balls at him not for him.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Holland

customer_reviews.title: So Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Hoping this was the answer to my crazy fetching dog. I will never know, it worked less than ten minutes. I returned it the same day that I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Litisha N. Akins

customer_reviews.title: Great toy but requires supervision.
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this except that it wont stay on. You have to push the button to town it on, it automatically turns off after a few minutes. I bought it hoping my dog could play with it even when I wasn't home.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: The ball launcher failed after 2 months of occasional use. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: PHIL MEYER

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Balls are smaller than a regular tennis ball, but durable. Abby destroys her toys, but not this ball. The balls are getting wet from her saliva.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: Good play machine that the dog likes to play with
customer_reviews.author: John O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this toy, because there are times my pup REALLY wants to play fetch when I can't, but this stopped working entirely after just a few uses. Won't turn on at all with fresh batteries, or when plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You may want to order extra balls if your dog eats them like mine.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. My morkie loves chasing the balls. Not as independent as I had hoped but I have not spent enough time teaching her to put ball in the hole.
customer_reviews.author: beth russell

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: The product worked for a few weeks and the. Lost it’s thrust with which the ball is sprung in the air. Waste of money for us.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Used and was supposed to be new. Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: It was nasty, used and abused. Didn't work at all. It was supposed to be new. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sharon v.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, Do not waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. Power button never turned on from the start. Unable to use even once.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works only every third time a ball is dropped into the unit.
customer_reviews.author: George Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Item works as described, our dogs enjoy playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog loved.  But broke
customer_reviews.text: Broke and tried to get replaced. Haven’t heard back. Dog loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not completel
customer_reviews.text: I got the item very fast, but i didn’t got all the electric plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Netanel Reuven

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described. I've had it running for 2 weeks now. My dog is too dumb to put it in himself, so that's apparently become my new job. Can't fault the product though.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Works as described
customer_reviews.text: So far it works as described. I need to teach my dog to drop the ball back in on her own. My only disappointment so far is the description said it comes with "3 Standard tennis balls". It does not. It comes with and uses mini size tennis balls. I was thinking I'd be able to use the normal size that I already have as spares. Not a huge deal but a little disappointing. Still for the money compared to the standard size launcher, I think this will work out. I just hope it is durable and lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVED this mini ball launcher. However, it only functioned properly for two months. I just purchased it in late September. 😞 now it just sits there teasing my dog. It turned out to be a very expensive toy.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Randez

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: This is great. We use it in the house daily. Good exercise for my Toy Poodle with lowest settings.
customer_reviews.author: George Beyers

customer_reviews.title: Cannot use regular sized tennis balls
customer_reviews.text: You cannot use regular tennis balls. You have to use the three small ones give. Super loud.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Wilmarth

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES this! Right after we got it, he got impatient and stuck his nose in the hole just in time for it to shoot the ball and hit him right in the kisser! It took some work but I got him okay with it again. My only complaint would be that it doesn’t stay on, so often he tries to play with it but it doesn’t throw his ball (because it’s not on!). Then he thinks if he yells at it enough, it’ll throw the ball. He also tries to put other toys in it and gets frustrated that it won’t throw them! All in all this is a great toy and well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: McGillicuddy

customer_reviews.title: Wrong balls
customer_reviews.text: The toy is good, but when they say "standard" tennis balls its wrong. 2" tennis balls so im kind of disappointed in that cuz i have 4 large dogs and only bought this one cause i saw the description say standard
customer_reviews.author: Kishna K

customer_reviews.title: Not as hands off as I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: Works well. My dog loves. However it shuts off after only a short amount of time. I would prefer it would stay on because he’ll get distracted and then come back but it’ll have turned off by then so he can’t do it himself.
customer_reviews.author: Pokekenz

customer_reviews.title: This product was terrible!
customer_reviews.text: It was dirty when I took it out of the box like it had been used before. It did not work as indicated. The ball did not go out with any force. It barely rolled out and maybe went 3 inches. I was very unhappy with it. It came from China which I did not know when I purchased it or I would not have. It took weeks to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: AFP Automatic Ball Launcher Dog Ball Thrower Machine Hyper Fetch Tennis Ball
product_meta.description: Pattern Name:Mini Ball LauncherFirst of all, push the "power on /off button" for 3 seconds to turn the Hyper fetch Mini on. The "power on/off indicator" (green light) will turn on. To turn off the Hyper Fetch Mini, push the "power on/off button" for another 3 seconds. Secondly, press "power on/off button" to choose the distance 10ft, 20ft or 30ft. Thirdly, put the balls in the ball basket on the top of the Hyper Fetch Mini. Finally, when balls are placed into the ball basket, the Hyper Fetch Mini will throw a ball every 10 seconds. Remarks There is a tennis ball sensor in the toy. It will scan every 10 seconds. Once detecting the ball, it will trigger the launch system to launch the ball out.
feature_bullets: ✅STIMULATE DOGS MIND automatic ball launcher challenging them to learn something new. Plays fetch with your dog, interactive features aid in training.
✅ADJUSTABLE DISTANCE SETTING make it throw 10ft, 20ft or 30ft. Great training tool for both older dogs and as a way to tire out energetic puppies.
✅ENTERTAIN & EXERCISE your pet indoors and outside with the all for paws automatic fetch ball launcher,this is the premium choice in automatic fetch games.
✅BALL LAUNCHER INCLUDES three standard tennis balls, ideal for a game of fetch. Works with 6 pcs C batteries ( not included ), or with AC adapter (included).
✅🐶✅ Satisfaction guaranteed or 100% refund; send feedback to customer service via order email

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
